DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect various LV-LV delay multi-site leave ventricular ( MSLV ) pace mechanical dyssynchrony cardiac resynchronization therapy ( CRT ) patient post-implant .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Evaluation Safety Left Ventricular-left Ventricular ( LV-LV ) Delays Its Effects Mechanical Dyssynchrony
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have approve indication CRT implant 2 . Undergoing previously receive implant St. Jude Medical Promote Q 322136 CRTD Quartet Model 1458Q LV lead participate clinical study site 3 . Ability provide inform consent study participation willing able comply prescribe evaluation 1 . Have persistent permanent atrial fibrillation 2 . Have intrinsic heart rate < 50 beat per minute 3 . Have CheyneStokes breathe 4 . Have undergone cardiac surgery coronary revascularization procedure within 3 month prior enrollment schedule procedure 5 . Have recent CVA TIA within 3 month prior enrollment 6 . Be less 18 year age 7 . Be pregnant
